alert.note: Alert for Guam (Guam) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued March 13 at 1:39PM ChST by NWS Guam
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 330 PM CHST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Mainly central and southern Guam * WHEN...Until 330 PM ChST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Ponding of water in urban or other areas is occurring or is imminent. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 136 PM ChST, gauge reports indicated heavy rain due showers forming over the island. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Overflowing poor drainage areas will cause minor flooding in the advisory area. Up to 0.8 inches of rain have fallen in a few spots in central Guam. - Additional rainfall amounts of 0.2 to 0.6 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
